sn45.33:4.2: “Mendicants, whoever has missed out on the noble eightfold path has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn45.33:4.3: Whoever has undertaken the noble eightfold path has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn45.33:4.4: And what is the noble eightfold path?
sn45.33:4.6: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.33:4.8: Whoever has missed out on the noble eightfold path has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn45.33:4.9: Whoever has undertaken the noble eightfold path has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.”
